paragraphs.context: Pixel phones may warm up during charging, gaming, or camera use. This is normal unless it's too hot to touch. Restart your phone and update software if it persists.

answers.text: Pixel phones may warm up during charging, gaming, or camera use

paragraphs.context: Press Power and Volume Down buttons together. You can also swipe up on the screen to access the recent apps menu and tap the Screenshot button.

paragraphs.context: Yes, Pixel phones get Android updates first. They typically receive 3 years of Android OS updates and 5 years of security patches.
